data.name: World of Art: JIGSTRIS
data.detailed_description:
JIGSTRIS
SIMPLE | FUN | RELAXING

World of Art JIGSTRIS is a new approach to jigsaw puzzle games.
Rules You`ll learn in seconds, fun and relaxing way to learn about Fine Art.
Based on World of Art rich Gallery of art from all around the World.



Enjoy!

data.supported_languages:
English*, Polish, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
